alert.note: Alert for Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 12:18PM MST until January 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Frank Church Wilderness-Big Lost Highlands/Copper Basin- Including the cities of Clayton and Copper Basin. * WHEN...From 8 AM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Lost Highlands, Copper Basin; Frank Church Wilderness
